dcterms:description: A public database for choral singing consisting of recordings of 3 songs performed by an SATB choir, with four singers per section. The recordings are separate, obtained from a spot mic, and include residues of other singers in the section.
dcterms:title: Choral Singing Dataset (CSD)

dcterms:description: A reduced database that takes into account a single Bach Chorales song, used for training and validation.
dcterms:title: BC1Song

dcterms:description: A commercial database containing 26+22 songs performed by a quartet of singers (SATB voices for the BC songs and tenor, lead, baritone, and bass voices for BSQ). It includes recordings of all individual voices and the choir.
dcterms:title: Bach Chorales-Barbershop Quartet (BCBSQ)

dcterms:creator: H. Cuesta
E. G´omez
dcterms:description: A choral database consisting of 11 songs performed by a professional SATB choir. It contains recordings of all voices.
dcterms:title: Cantor´ıa
